mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question (item_id, write_date_time, content, img_url, member_id, title, question_type, answer_status) VALUES (#{itemId}, #{writeDateTime}, #{content}, #{imgUrl}, #{memberId}, #{title}, #{questionType}, #{answerStatus})
INSERT INTO question_answer (question_id, write_date_time, admin_id, content, title) VALUES (#{questionId}, NOW(), #{adminId}, #{content}, #{title})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM question_answer WHERE question_id = #{questionId}
